name: Nordek
description: What is the project about? Lightspeed Ecosystem of ‍Web3 Payment & Gaming Solutions What makes your project unique? NORDEK, the cutting-edge layer 2 blockchain on Ethereum, is set to revolutionize the gaming and payments industry with its suite of innovative solutions and an ultra-low gas fee structure. With our mainnet already up and running, we are all set to launch a range of exciting products, starting with the NORPAY - Crypto Banking App, PlayTradeWin game, FASTSCAN merchant payment solution, NEMESIS DOWNFALL - Single Shooter Game, and many more. We are thrilled to join hands with Gaming Guilds and online merchants to make crypto payments accessible to the masses and usher in the next wave of crypto adoption. At NORDEK, we are committed to empowering our users with top-notch, reliable, and secure solutions that transform the way we transact and play. Join us in this thrilling journey toward a crypto-enabled future! History of your project. We have started this Last year, Our Blockchain Mainnet is Live and we are about to list NRk on more then 10 Exchanges What’s next for your project? Norpay, Norswap, Norflix etc. What can your token be used for? Payments and in Gaming Industry
